fr.sorbonne_u.components.pubsub.interfaces

Interface PubSubService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PubSubService.Offered
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PubSub, PubSubInBoundPort, PubSubNode

    public interface PubSubService
    The PubsubService interface defines the contract that a PubSub Component must uphold.

    The interface declares an Offered sub-interface which implements the OfferedI interface since it will be implemented by a pubsub in-bound port.

    See Also:
    PubSubInBoundPort
